alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 15 at 2:06AM PST until January 15 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts 60 to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes travel across Interstate 5 and Highway 14.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
